articles.description: After a forgettable IPL 2022, Siraj has been on fire so far for RCB this season, carrying on his good international form.
articles.content: In 2017, when Mohammad Siraj made his Indian Premier League debut with the Sunrisers Hyderabad, he made a promise to himself. He saw Bhuvneshwar Kumar, his senior and team-mate with the purple cap an… [+9042 chars]
